name: Tetr.Nes
description:
Tetris Nes in browser with out ROM hacks emu's or something else.

Controls:

Start / Select / Confirm with SPACE

Rotate with UP ARROW KEY /  Right Shift (Clockwise) / Left Shift (Counter-Clockwise)

Move piece with ARROW KEYS

Soft drop with ARROWN DOWN

Select game type / Music with ARROW KEYS

It's mobile friendly, you can play in mobile browser (tablet , phone .etc)

DONT MİND THE SCORES CUZ' THE SCORES ARE FROM MY GAME TESTS
